trans-unit.source: Provides information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted"></xref> event that occurs when a user completes a drag operation with the mouse of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 相關資訊提供<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted"></xref>使用者完成拖曳作業使用的滑鼠時，就會發生的事件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragCompletedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragCompletedEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal change in position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control, resulting from the drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 在位置的水平變更<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>控制，拖曳作業產生的。

trans-unit.source: The vertical change in position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control, resulting from the drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 在位置的垂直變更<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>控制，拖曳作業產生的。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the drag operation was canceled by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag*> method.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否在拖曳作業已取消由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag*>

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the drag operation for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> was canceled by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag*> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得是否為拖曳作業<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>已取消由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a drag operation was canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已取消拖曳作業。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal change in position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> after the user drags the control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 取得水平變更的位置中<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>使用者拖曳滑鼠控制項之後。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal difference between the point at which the user pressed the left mouse button and the point at which the user released the button during a drag operation of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按下滑鼠左的按鈕的點和使用者在拖曳作業期間放開按鈕的點之間的水平差異<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Converts a method that handles the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted"></xref> event to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragCompletedEventHandler"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: 將處理的方法，轉換<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragCompleted"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragCompletedEventHandler"></xref>型別。

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the `genericHandler` as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragCompletedEventHandler>.
Gets the vertical change in position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> after the user drags the control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 取得位置中的垂直變更<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>使用者拖曳滑鼠控制項之後。

trans-unit.source: The vertical difference between the point at which the user pressed the left mouse button and the point at which the user released the button during a drag operation of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按下滑鼠左的按鈕的點和使用者在拖曳作業期間放開按鈕的點之間的垂直差異<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>控制項。
